name: Jigsaw Puzzle Pro+
description:
Jigsaw Puzzles Joyo is the most advanced jigsaw game for iphone/ipad.

You can enjoy high quality images that, for sure, will provide you many hours of entertainment。

Take a break at any time with this relaxing game.

The gameplay is so simple:
- Autosave.
- Final image preview.
- Very easy and intuitive.
- Share completed puzzles.
- Difficulty self-adjustment.
- Challenge your friends.
- rotating pieces, just tapping on each one.

Solve your favourite jigsaw puzzles on the go! It can't miss on your iPhone/iPod/iPad!
